name: toBinary
description: Calculates the binary representation of Base64-encoded data.

params.name: base64_or_object
params.description:
A string or a variable that contains one:
 * In Base64 format to convert to binary
 * In binary format to test whether it is valid

links.title: Converting Data Between String, Binary, Hex, And Base64 Format
links.description: Tutorial showing how to convert the string to toBinary Value
